description: Returns information about a configured audience model policy.

parameters.name: configuredAudienceModelArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configured audience model that you are interested in.

nested_items.name: configuredAudienceModelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configured audience model.

nested_items.name: configuredAudienceModelPolicy
nested_items.description: The configured audience model policy. This is a JSON IAM resource policy.

nested_items.name: policyHash
nested_items.description: A cryptographic hash of the contents of the policy used to prevent unexpected concurrent modification of the policy.
